Sentencas: In this paper, a new concept of diesel fuel processing is introduced for the stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: High temperature operation of SOFCs can lead to the capability of internal reforming with fuel flexibility.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: SOFCs can directly use CH4 and CO as fuels given sufficient steam feeds due to catalytic reaction on the SOFC anode.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: However, heavier hydrocarbons than CH4, such as ethylene, ethane, propane, etc., induce carbon deposition on the Ni-based anode of SOFCs.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: In the case of an ethylene steam reforming reaction on the Ni-based catalyst, the rate of carbon deposition is faster than it is when hydrocarbons, including aromatics, are used.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: Hence, the removal of light hydrocarbons (over C-1-hydrocarbons), especially ethylene, with the reformate gases of heavy hydrocarbons (diesel, gasoline, kerosene, and JP-8) is important for stable operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: A new methodology, called the post-reformer, is introduced for removing the light hydrocarbons (over C-1-hydrocarbons) with the reformate gas stream.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: The CGO-Ru (3.0 wt.%) catalyst was selected as the post-reforming catalyst because it shows high selectivity for removing light hydrocarbons (over C-1-hydrocarbons) and achieving the high reforming efficiency.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: The diesel reformer and post-reformer are continuously operated for about 200 h in an integrated mode.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor

Sentencas: The reforming performance did not degrade, and light hydrocarbons (over C-1-hydrocarbons) in the diesel reformate were completely removed.
Titulo: A diesel fuel processor for stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system: I. Introduction to post-reforming for the diesel fuel processor
